website_summaries.verdict: The vintage Asics Gel collection continues to have a loyal following among sneakerheads and admirers of classic lace-up kicks. The low-top Asics Gel Circuit may have already retired from the court, but it still grants plush comfort with the presence of the proprietary Gel-cushioning component in the midsole, a smooth interior, and a moderately padded sockliner.Its hard-wearing cover, made mostly in leather, and a thick slab of rubber on the sole are some of the indications that this Asics Gel sneaker is ready to take on some abuses.
pros: According to most statements, the Asics Gel Circuit comes with durable leather upper
Satisfied users reiterated that this Asics sneaker has a comfortable Gel cushioning on the heel
The side to side measurement is accurately constructed as mentioned by those with medium width foot
Most of those who rated this shoe gave it an A+ score for its overall appeal
The ankle offers luxurious comfort, as mentioned in some statements
Some reviews described that this shoe has a smooth fabric lining that hugs the feet comfortably
As explained by a couple of reviewers it has an extra thick rubber outsole that can be expected to last a long time
cons: An online shopper commented that the image looks better than the actual shoe

customer_reviews.title: Good for someone with small arms, orders 1-2 sizes up, and during cool weather
customer_reviews.text: I don't have thick biceps or shoulders and the arm opening is too tight; it rides halfway into the armpit and cannot be ignored while walking around the house. Not good for my purposes (walking the dog in summer) much less participating in an active sport or going to the gym. The material, "ASICS motion dry fabric," is as thick as a typical winter under layer rather than a shirt for hot weather activities. Good for someone who: 1. Has smaller arms 2. Orders 1 (fitted) or 2 (loose) sizes up 3. Uses the shirt as a cool-weather baselayer (for example: a baselayer for winter sports, cool evening activities in the summer, or for those sensitive to cooler temps).
customer_reviews.author: My2sense

customer_reviews.title: Entirely Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: This is not exclusive to just Asics but to just about every sportswear manufacturer on the planet. A trend started a while back to make everything contour fitting and tight. In general exercise gear has become flat out uncomfortable and this top is no different. I have an athletic build and found myself squeezing into this top and it is a large. Typically an XL is the same fit only slightly longer. The quality appeared fine and that's why I gave it a 3 star rating. The fit would definitely be a 1 star. Last time I buy clothing on-line.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: I like sleeveless T's for running in summer - some protection but cooler than a full T. This shirt does that. My one complaint is the neck hole is tighter than I like. Can be uncomfortable. I ordered a large and have a 15.5 neck.
customer_reviews.author: Rwalk

customer_reviews.title: Fitted for Slim Build
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly and fits perfectly. I’m a 6’5” 195lb collegiate volleyball athlete and ordered a size L. If you wanted it to be a bit roomier, order a size up. Fits long enough for tall people in the torso compared to most other ASICS shirts (in my experience).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gal

customer_reviews.title: Ok shirt, sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an XL in these types of shirts but wanted it loose so went 2XL... it's tighter than other brands of this type of shirt that are only XL Order 2 sizes bigger than you want if you want it loose at all.
customer_reviews.author: TXdirt

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Size I ordered received saying 2x and they hardly fit. The two shirts have to be a large and not bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Tombishop6

customer_reviews.title: No Problem, perfect for extreme training/running - in the summer
customer_reviews.text: Great top for running, crossfit, weight training, and almost every fitness (except water sports)
customer_reviews.author: Pureflipking

customer_reviews.title: Good Workout Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband. He really likes it. It fits as expected. Buy the next larger size if you want it to be loose.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmotherofThree

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good colour and fit, slightly long but not enough to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. J. Coupe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like. Color, fit, wicking material all good.
customer_reviews.author: George H Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this tank. Perfect fit and keeps me dry and cool as suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Dar

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the Circuit 7
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed in the overall cut. The 8 runs very very small in size XL. I ordered an XXL and it still was cut tight in the chest and body. I have liked the circuit for overall workouts at the gym. I will have to find an alternative to what was once a brat shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Bgosh78

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice workout shirt, not sure it’s material is ideal for running (rough on your nips after the 2nd mile)
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Have a couple of these and thought I would get another so ordered same size but this one was way to small. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What the size is compared to
customer_reviews.text: The size was misrepresented. The shirt was a 2XL and it fit like a large.
customer_reviews.author: Carl R. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Size was misleading
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3XL and they fit like an XL. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: ... 6 other asics shirts and they have all fit fine - this one was very tight
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 6 other asics shirts and they have all fit fine - this one was very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Sports top
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. Fits perfect. For wear while running or just lounging around.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Solis

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Circuit 8 Warm-up Sleeveless Sleeveless Sleeveless
product_meta.description: Whether your goal is an extra rep or an extra lap, our lightweight circuit 8 sleeveless tee helps you get there. The breathable ASICS motion dry fabric keeps you dry and cool so you can stay strong. Add a team logo for a unified practice look.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
